259892.<speed=0>\n大富豪の 基本ルールについて\n確認することが できます。: <speed=0>Here you can review Tycoon's basic rules.<break>

259893.<speed=0>\n大富豪の対戦のうち\n『段位戦』『なかま対戦』『ひとりで練:
This will explain "Ranked Battle", "Party Battle", and "Playing Alone" for Tycoon.
"Ranked Battle" matches you with 3 other players and you will play with the Ranked Rules, which change daily.
In a Ranked Battle match, you will play 3 games and compete for the highest number of points.
"Party Battle" lets you play with friends and you'll play with the party leader's chosen rules.
However, please be aware that you'll earn less Card Points in a Party Battle than in a Ranked Battle.
When you have less than 4 players for a Party Battle, the empty spots will be filled by computer-controlled opponents.
In "Practice Alone", you can choose your own rules, but you won't receive any Card Points.
In both Party Battle and Practice Alone, you can choose the amount of games to play, up to total of 4 games.
Play Ranked Battle to test your own skills, and play Party Battle to enjoy casual games with your friends.

259894.<speed=0>\n各プレイヤーには 階級があり\n１ゲーム目は 全員「平民」:
Each player has a rank, and the first game begins with all commoners... In the first game, the player with the three of diamonds
is the parent and starts the game. In turn, each player must play a card that is stronger than the card on the board, and when all the
cards in their hand are played, they win. In the next game, the player's rank is determined by the order of their winnings:
millionaire, rich, poor, and poorest. In the second game, before the game begins, you must exchange cards with a player of another rank.
The richest player trades two cards from his hand for the poorest player's two best cards. The richest player trades a card from his
hand for the poorest player's best card. From the second game onwards, the poorest player is the parent and starts the game. When all
the games are over, the final ranking is determined by the sum of the points won.

259895.<speed=0>\n自分のターンでは カードを出さずに\nパスすることもできま:
On your turn, you can pass without playing a card... If you play a card, and everyone else passes, the cards in the field are discarded.
When the field runs out, you become the parent, and you can play a new card of your choice... You can pass as many times as you
like, but you can't pass on the first turn when you're the parent...

259896.<speed=0>\n自分のターンの時や カードを選ぶ時の\n制限時間は <%n:
When it's your turn, or when you choose a card, you have a time limit of <%nM_timelimit>... When the time limit
expires, the game automatically passes... If you are the parent and the time limit expires, your card is automatically played...
If you miss the time limit twice in a row, you'll be penalized and you'll be out of the game.

259897.<speed=0>\nカードの強さは 弱い順に並べると\n３ ４ ５ ６ ７ ８:
The cards, listed in order of strength from weakest to strongest, are three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine. 10, J, Q, K, A, 2,
Joker... Now, if the cards are in different suits (diamonds, spades, hearts, clubs), but they have the same number, they have the same
strength. However, the Joker can be used as the strongest card, even if its strength is reversed by a revolution or an 11-back...

259898.<speed=0>\n場に１枚 カードが出ている時\nより強いカードを １枚出し:
When there is a card in the field, you can play a stronger card... When there are no cards in the field, you can play multiple
cards of the same number at the same time... If more than one card is played, the player on the next turn can only play the same
number of cards... The Joker can be used in place of any other card when more than one card is played at the same time...

259899.<speed=0>\n大富豪には 基本ルールのほかに\n追加ルールがあります。\:
<speed=0>In addition to the basic rules, there are
additional rules... Each of these rules can
be found in the "Custom Rules" section...<end>

<speed=0>
To receive your rewards, please speak to
Tycoon Club Member Pugol in Luckland.
<end>

players of the same rank before starting.

4 Games
